t: Typography
s: Typography plays an important role in Amazon Echo brand recognition. It communicates a consistent, unified identity and gives instant personality to our written words. Learn more about our typography here.

t: Amazon Logo and symbol, meaning, history, PNG, brand
s: The original logo for the online platform was developed by Turner Duckworth in 1995 and was stylish and symbolic. The stylized black bold letter “A” was the main element of the logo, with a smooth vertical white line, repeating the contours of the Amazon river.
